name: mtfh-tl-e2e-tests
description: End to end tests for MTFH T&L

scripts.test:cypress:run: cypress run -e TAGS='not @GoogleLighthouse and not @Accessibility and not @ignore and not @flaky and not @device and not @LongRunning and not @ignoreDev'
scripts.test:cypress:development: cypress run -e TAGS='not @GoogleLighthouse and not @Accessibility and not @ignore and not @flaky and not @device and not @LongRunning and not @ignoreDev'
scripts.test:cypress:staging: cypress run -e TAGS='not @GoogleLighthouse and not @Accessibility and not @ignore and not @flaky and not @device and not @LongRunning and not @ignoreStaging'
scripts.test:cypress:production: cypress run -e TAGS='@Production and not @ignore and not @ignoreProd'
scripts.test:cypress:smoke: cypress run --browser chrome --headless -e TAGS='@SmokeTest and not @ignore'
